h1_title: The Four Heavenly Kings and Erlang Shen
h2_title: The Four Heavenly Kings Boss Fight and Guide
content: About halfway through the fight, you'll also be able to start using Ice Bath. When you use the Ice Bath Spell, the Stone Monkey's arms will be covered in frost, and when you punch, you'll inflict frost damage.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'The_Four_Heavenly_Kings_and_Erlang_Shen.md', within the main section titled 'The Four Heavenly Kings and Erlang Shen', specifically from the subsection 'The Four Heavenly Kings Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
About halfway through the fight, you'll also be able to start using Ice Bath. When you use the Ice Bath Spell, the Stone Monkey's arms will be covered in frost, and when you punch, you'll inflict frost damage.
